title: Multiple critical vulnerabilities in Odnoklassniki Android application

activities.message: Hello, I have heard the vulnerabilities has been resolved already. Are there any updates from your side?
@alexandra_ok Are there any updates regarding this report?
Hey, this is starting to be ridiculous. How much more time do you need to get things moving? @alexandra_ok

Hi! 
Most of the described issues have been fixed, except for the one with StartVideoUploadActivity. This is hardly exploitable since actual upload requires explicit user confirmation. Let's consider the report resolved.
Mobile apps are out of the program scope (https://hackerone.com/ok), but we still award critical issues. Thanks for reporting this and for your patience.
Can this report go public? Thank you for the reward.
At least a response would be polite. I am on opinion that making this public would help people to learn.
